localizedMeta.description:
Flight of the Turtle

Live the life of a turtle who can fly. Every turtle's dream is to fly and now you're able to sit back and enjoy this fun, casual, fast paced game that will keep you entertained.

Watch out for trees, bees and birds as you navigate day and night living the turtles' dream. Grab stars as fast as you can for optimum point advantages. But be careful, those stars could be your downfall!

Package size: 17 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Copyright (C) 2013 Jeff King Enterprise. All Rights Reserved.

Live the life of a turtle who can fly. Every turtle's dream is to fly and now you're able to sit back and enjoy this fun, casual, fast paced game that will keep you entertained.

Watch out for trees, bees and birds as you navigate day and night living the turtles' dream. Grab stars as fast as you can for optimum point advantages. But be careful, those stars could be your downfall!

Package size: 17 MB - More storage space required for install

English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Copyright (C) 2013 Jeff King Enterprise. All Rights Reserved.

Flight of the Turtle

Vivez la vie d'une tortue qui peut voler. Le rêve de chaque tortue est de voler et vous êtes maintenant en mesure de s'asseoir et profiter de ce jeu amusant occasionnel, trépidant que vous allez vous amuser.

Méfiez-vous des arbres, des abeilles et des oiseaux que vous naviguez jour et nuit vivre le rêve de la tortue. Prenez étoiles aussi vite que vous pouvez pour avantages du point optimal. Mais attention, ces étoiles pourrait être votre chute!

Taille du programme : 17 MB - Plus d’espace de stockage est requis pour l’installation

Information sur la compatibilité :
Nombre de joueurs pour le jeu local : 1 joueur

Interfaces / capteurs compatibles
- Écran tactile
- Manette / Manette d’écran

Langues prises en charge :
Anglais(États-Unis)/Anglais(Royaume-Uni)

Copyright (C) 2013 Jeff King Enterprise. All Rights Reserved.
